list_Mcq.question: Typical acronym of reuseable optical storage will be ......
Storage which stores or retains data after power off is called
When we work on any document on PC, it is stored temporarily on—
USB – type storage device is—
Built in memory of computer is ..........
RAM is a ........ memory—
The faster, costlier and relatively small form of storage managed by computer system hardware is :
Permanent instructions that the computer uses when it is turned on and that can not be changed by other instructions are contained in

In the following which is not RAM ?
Which one is random access memory—

With a CD you can ..
A CD-ROM disk.
list_Mcq.optionb: (B) Has more storage capacity than a CD-R
list_Mcq.optionc: (C) Holds less data than a floppy disk

list_Mcq.question: In computer dictionary letters CD are used for
CD ROM is used–
Unit of storage capacity
By firmware we understand ......
list_Mcq.optiona: (A) Physical equipment used in a computer system
list_Mcq.optionb: (B) A set of instructions that causes a computer to perform one or more tasks
list_Mcq.optionc: (C) The people involved in the computing process
list_Mcq.optiond: (D) A set of programs that it pre-installed into the read only memory of a computer during the time of manufacturing

list_Mcq.question: Computer hardware which stores large volume of data is called

list_Mcq.optiona: (A) Has a faster access than an internal disk
list_Mcq.optionb: (B) Is a form or optical disk, so it can only be written once
list_Mcq.optionc: (C) Holds less data than a floppy disk
